description: From Middle English lyftyme, equivalent to life +‎ time. Compare Saterland Frisian Lieuwendstied, Dutch leeftijd and levenstijd, German Low German Levenstied, German Lebenszeit, Danish livstid, Swedish livstid, Icelandic líftími.

entries.meaning: The duration of the life of someone or something.
examples: a project that will take many human lifetimes to complete
the operational lifetime of an aircraft component

entries.meaning: (informal, hyperbolic) A long period of time.
examples: I've been waiting a lifetime for a train.
Synonyms: ages, (UK slang) donkey's years, eternity, (UK slang) years, yonks
